text: Bassjackers is an electronic music duo, formed in 2007, consisting of Marlon Flohr and Ralph van Hilst, two Dutch DJs and producers. == Albums == === Studio albums === {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center;" |+ List of studio albums !
